title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Indigo

abstract: Nine stories about the life of towns from Indigo Shire, located in northern Victoria.
description: Nine stories centred around three towns of Indigo Shire in northern Victoria: Yackandandah, Beechworth and Rutherglen. These films cover different aspects of the life of these towns. From local businesses to burning passions, the locals reflect on what they put in and what they get out of these rural centres.
